pullrequest.title: Implement collision filtering based on collide_bitmask property

content.raw: It doesn’t override it! While looking at the dartsim [API](https://dartsim.github.io/dart/v6.7.3/d6/d6e/classdart_1_1collision_1_1BodyNodeCollisionFilter.html) I found that the BodyNodeCollisionFilter class already has a [map of pairs](https://dartsim.github.io/dart/v6.7.3/d6/d6e/classdart_1_1collision_1_1BodyNodeCollisionFilter.html#a95c65203c4727215e4cb5b4cf8b15d5f) of ignored BodyNode pointers that can be edited via [add / remove functions](https://dartsim.github.io/dart/v6.7.3/d6/d6e/classdart_1_1collision_1_1BodyNodeCollisionFilter.html#a3c2356646f799e3d5996c30cab876849). Hence instead of overriding the ignoresCollision method and reimplementing the same functionality I thought of just using the API provided by the object itself.
content.html: It doesn’t override it! While looking at the dartsim API I found that the BodyNodeCollisionFilter class already has a map of pairs of ignored BodyNode pointers that can be edited via add / remove functions. Hence instead of overriding the ignoresCollision method and reimplementing the same functionality I thought of just using the API provided by the object itself.
